title: LIQUIDITY SUPPORT FOR MICRO-ENTERPRISES AFFECTED BY THE COVID EMERGENCY
abstract: SUPPORT FOR THE LIQUIDITY OF MICRO AND SMALL ENTERPRISES IN THE RETAIL, SUPPLY AND PERSONAL SERVICES SECTORS WHOSE ACTIVITY HAS BEEN SUSPENDED AS A RESULT OF THE PRIME MINISTERIAL DECREE OF 11 MARCH 2020

motivations: Micro-enterprises in the retail, supply, and personal services sectors face liquidity challenges due to the suspension of their activities as a result of the COVID-19 emergency.
objectives: Provide liquidity support to micro-enterprises affected by the COVID-19 emergency to help them overcome financial difficulties.
results: Mitigate the financial impact of the COVID-19 emergency on micro-enterprises in the targeted sectors.
llama_json.research_subject: Liquidity support for micro-enterprises affected by the COVID-19 emergency

motivations: Micro and small enterprises in the retail, supply, and personal services sectors have had their activities suspended due to the COVID-19 pandemic, leading to liquidity issues.
objectives: Provide liquidity support for micro and small enterprises affected by the COVID-19 emergency.
openai_json.research_subject: Liquidity support for micro-enterprises affected by the COVID-19 emergency

motivations: Micro and small enterprises in retail, supply, and personal services sectors faced liquidity crises due to mandatory activity suspensions during the COVID-19 emergency.
objectives: Provide liquidity support to micro and small enterprises whose activities were suspended by the Prime Ministerial Decree of 11 March 2020.
